scripts.build: npm install && npm install -g @angular/cli@latest && mkdir publish && cp *.*js publish/ && cp *.map publish/ && cp *.html publish/ && cp *.css publish/ && cp hm-datetimepicker publish/hm-datetimepicker && cp hm-grid publish/hm-grid && cd hm-walls && npm install && npm run build -c production --output-path ../publish/hm-walls/dist && cd ../hm-walls-api && npm install && npm run build --prod && cd ../material-test && npm install && npm run build --prod && cp dist/ ../publish/material-test/ && cp index.html ../publish/material-test/ && cd ../mynsweepr-angular && npm install && npm run build -c production --output-path ../publish/mynsweepr-angular/dist && cd ../mynsweepr-hooks && npm install && npm run build --prod && cp build/ ../publish/mynsweepr-hooks/ && cd ../mynsweepr-tres && npm install && npm run build --prod && cp build/ ../public/mynsweepr-tres/ && cd ../mynsweepr-vue && npm install && npm run build --prod
